main event: A civilian observed a small disk-shaped object in the sky for about 30 seconds in Huntington, New York.
interesting points: The object was described as fairly low and moving fairly rapidly,No physical evidence was found or reported,The sighting occurred in the afternoon at 1630 on March 21, 1968,The observer was in their backyard when they saw the object,The object disappeared suddenly without leaving a trace.
witness description: a civilian observing from their backyard
